channel.title: Miracles Against The Monotony - Sunny [Bassy]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/alwayssunnyinlogan/miracles-against-the-monotony
Trying to add something a bit fresh to the Soundcloud. I’m enjoying the hell out of RAC Essentials, and really working to polish a bunch of songs made with it. Been playing with this one for a couple of weeks, and found the motivation to clean it up.
It’s really nice being able to have a community of users to talk to. Gets your creativity flowing.
Comments and criticism always welcomed.
